subject: College Athletics
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
Football
lead_paragraph: Tennesse’s use of “hostesses” as college football recruiters was tacky, and the university befouled the concept of education by sending them out to court blue-chip prospects.
snippet: Tennesse’s use of “hostesses” as college football recruiters was tacky, and the university befouled the concept of education by sending them out to court blue-chip prospects.
